name: Primitive Maintenance
description:
Primitive Maintenance is a quirky platformer in a world of insects.

You are a foreigner, from a distant land. You came here to see the machine, one of the few remaining devices built by the ancestors. You must try to find a way to repair it, and see what it was once used for.

This game was made for Godot Wild Jam #35 (theme: Lost Tech)
